action.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
action.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with a mysterious woman to fight a tyrannical leader.

action.title: John Wick
action.description: An ex-hitman comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that took everything from him.

action.title: Die Hard
action.description: New York City police officer John McClane fights a group of terrorists in a Los Angeles skyscraper.

action.title: Gladiator
action.description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

action.title: The Dark Knight
action.description: Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice when the Joker emerges.

action.title: Inception
action.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets using dream-sharing technology is given the task of planting an idea into a CEO's mind.

action.title: The Avengers
action.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

action.title: Casino Royale
action.description: James Bond's first mission as 007 leads him to a high-stakes poker game against a private banker funding terrorists.

action.title: Transformers
action.description: An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth.

action.title: The Matrix
action.description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

action.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
action.description: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team join forces with some familiar allies to face off against a new threat.

action.title: Avatar
action.description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

action.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
action.description: A young street kid is recruited into a secret spy organization, where he must prove his worth to become a Kingsman agent.

action.title: Deadpool
action.description: A former special forces operative turned mercenary is subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers.

action.title: Skyfall
action.description: Bond's loyalty to M is tested as her past comes back to haunt her, bringing MI6 under attack.

action.title: Pacific Rim
action.description: As an alien threat emerges, humanity's last hope lies in a team of pilots who control giant robots.
King Leonidas of Sparta leads 300 warriors against an invading Persian army.

action.title: The Equalizer
action.description: A retired black ops operative seeks vengeance against those who unjustly harmed a young girl.

action.title: RoboCop
action.description: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg with submerged memories.

action.title: The Transporter
action.description: A professional driver for hire is caught up in a world of crime when he takes on a job that requires him to transport a mysterious package.

drama.title: The Shawshank Redemption
drama.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

drama.title: Forrest Gump
drama.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of a man with an IQ of 75.

drama.title: Fight Club
drama.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

drama.title: The Godfather
drama.description: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

drama.title: Schindler's List
drama.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution.

drama.title: The Pursuit of Happyness
drama.description: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.

drama.title: 12 Years a Slave
drama.description: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man, is abducted and sold into slavery.

drama.title: The Social Network
drama.description: As Harvard students create the social networking site that would become Facebook, they must deal with both personal and legal ramifications.

drama.title: A Beautiful Mind
drama.description: The true story of John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, and his struggle with schizophrenia.

drama.title: The Green Mile
drama.description: A supernatural tale set on death row in a Southern prison, where gentle giant John Coffey possesses the mysterious power to heal.

drama.title: The Intouchables
drama.description: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

drama.title: Moonlight
drama.description: A young African-American man grapples with his identity and sexuality while experiencing the trials of childhood, adolescence, and adulthood.

drama.title: The King's Speech
drama.description: The story of King George VI's effort to overcome his speech impediment with the help of an unorthodox speech therapist.

drama.title: Her
drama.description: In a future where technology is ever-evolving, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

drama.title: The Revenant
drama.description: A frontiersman on a quest for revenge against those who left him for dead must navigate a brutal wilderness.

drama.title: The Help
drama.description: In 1960s Mississippi, three women form an unlikely friendship around a secret writing project that could change their lives and the lives of generations to come.

drama.title: Good Will Hunting
drama.description: Will Hunting, a janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

drama.title: Boyhood
drama.description: The life of a young boy, Mason, is captured over 12 years, from childhood to adulthood.

drama.title: The Fault in Our Stars
drama.description: Two teenagers with cancer fall in love and must deal with their illness together.

drama.title: Spotlight
drama.description: The true story of how a team of Boston Globe reporters uncovered a massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese.

comedy.title: Superbad
comedy.description: Two high school friends try to make the most of their last days before graduation and end up in a wild adventure.

comedy.title: Groundhog Day
comedy.description: A cynical weatherman finds himself reliving the same day over and over again.

comedy.title: The Hangover
comedy.description: Three friends wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the groom missing.

comedy.title: Bridesmaids
comedy.description: A competition between the maid of honor and a bridesmaid to prove who is the best friend of the bride.

comedy.title: Mean Girls
comedy.description: A new student at a high school is targeted by the queen bee of the popular girls and learns the rules of the social hierarchy.

comedy.title: Step Brothers
comedy.description: Two aimless middle-aged losers become roommates when their parents marry each other.

comedy.title: 21 Jump Street
comedy.description: Two underachieving cops are sent back to high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring.

comedy.title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
comedy.description: A middle-aged man's friends try to help him lose his virginity.

comedy.title: The Other Guys
comedy.description: Two mismatched New York City detectives seize an opportunity to step up like the city's top cops whom they idolize.

comedy.title: Zombieland
comedy.description: A shy student trying to reach his family in Ohio, while the zombie apocalypse is in full effect.

thriller.title: Se7en
thriller.description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.

thriller.title: Gone Girl
thriller.description: A man becomes the prime suspect in the disappearance of his wife.

thriller.title: Prisoners
thriller.description: When two girls go missing, a desperate father takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads.

thriller.title: Shutter Island
thriller.description: A U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a mental institution.

thriller.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
thriller.description: A journalist and a hacker team up to solve the mystery of a woman who disappeared 40 years ago.

thriller.title: Black Swan
thriller.description: A ballet dancer's obsession with perfection leads her down a dark path.

thriller.title: The Silence of the Lambs
thriller.description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative killer to catch another serial killer.

thriller.title: Memento
thriller.description: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

thriller.title: The Sixth Sense
thriller.description: A young boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

thriller.title: Oldboy
thriller.description: After being imprisoned for 15 years, a man is released and must find his captor in five days.

sciFi.title: Interstellar
sciFi.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

sciFi.title: Blade Runner 2049
sciFi.description: A young blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard.

sciFi.title: Arrival
sciFi.description: A linguist is recruited by the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after a series of worldwide alien spacecraft land.

sciFi.title: The Fifth Element
sciFi.description: In the 23rd century, a cab driver becomes a central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

sciFi.title: District 9
sciFi.description: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly finds a kindred spirit in a government agent.

sciFi.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
sciFi.description: After a painful breakup, a couple undergoes a procedure to erase each other from their memories.

sciFi.title: Gravity
sciFi.description: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.

sciFi.title: Ex Machina
sciFi.description: A young programmer is selected to participate in a groundbreaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced A.I.

sciFi.title: Ready Player One
sciFi.description: In a dystopian future, a teenager finds himself in a virtual reality world where he must compete to find an Easter egg.

sciFi.title: Children of Men
sciFi.description: In a world where humans can no longer reproduce, a disillusioned bureaucrat becomes an unlikely champion in the fight for humanity's survival.

romance.title: The Notebook
romance.description: A poor young man and a rich young woman fall in love during the summer of 1940.

romance.title: Pride and Prejudice
romance.description: In 19th century England, a spirited young woman faces obstacles to find true love.

romance.title: La La Land
romance.description: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles.

romance.title: Titanic
romance.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

romance.title: Silver Linings Playbook
romance.description: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano tries to rebuild his life and forms a bond with a mysterious girl.

romance.title: 10 Things I Hate About You
romance.description: A new student is required to find a guy to date a headstrong girl to get close to her younger sister.

romance.title: When Harry Met Sally...
romance.description: Harry and Sally's friendship is tested when they begin to question if men and women can be friends without romantic involvement.

romance.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love.
romance.description: When his marriage comes to an end, a man seeks help from a bachelor to regain his confidence.

romance.title: Notting Hill
romance.description: A London bookseller falls for a high-profile American actress.

romance.title: A Walk to Remember
romance.description: A rebellious young man is thrown together with a quiet preacher's daughter, and they discover a bond that leads to an unexpected romance.

horror.title: Get Out
horror.description: A young African-American man uncovers a disturbing secret when he meets his white girlfriend's family.

horror.title: The Conjuring
horror.description: Paranormal investigators help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

horror.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
horror.description: Teenagers in a small town are terrorized by Freddy Krueger, a disfigured man who haunts dreams.

horror.title: Hereditary
horror.description: A grieving family is haunted after the death of their secretive grandmother.

horror.title: It
horror.description: A group of bullied kids band together when a shapeshifting demon, taking the appearance of clown, begins hunting children.

horror.title: The Babadook
horror.description: A widowed mother and her son confront their fears when a sinister presence invades their home.

horror.title: The Ring
horror.description: A reporter investigates a mysterious videotape that seems to cause the death of its viewers exactly seven days after they watch it.

horror.title: Saw
horror.description: Two strangers awaken in a room with no recollection of how they got there and must survive a deadly game.

horror.title: Paranormal Activity
horror.description: After moving into a suburban home, a couple becomes increasingly disturbed by a nightly demonic presence.

horror.title: The Witch
horror.description: A family in 1630s New England is torn apart by the forces of witchcraft, black magic, and possession.
